pages.text: Moloch the Ravenous. Moloch the All-Consuming. Moloch the Devourer of Worlds. Moloch the End of Innocence. Moloch the Price Too Great. Moloch the Hateful. Moloch the Fell God. Moloch the Bull. These are all but many titles given to this demon.
The rest of this page is indecipherable, as it appears to be smeared in blood. The face of a child is vaguely visible though, followed by it being consumed by a bull.
